code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useCallback}from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import axiosInstance from'./axiosSetup';import Sidebar from'./Sidebar';import'./Chat.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Chat=()=>{const location=useLocation();const{query}=location.state||{};const[message,setMessage]=useState(query||'');const[chatHistory,setChatHistory]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[isSidebarOpen,setIsSidebarOpen]=useState(false);const fetchChatHistory=useCallback(async()=>{try{const response=await axiosInstance.get('/api/chat/history/');setChatHistory(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching chat history:',error);}},[]);const sendMessage=useCallback(async messageToSend=>{setLoading(true);setChatHistory(prevHistory=>[...prevHistory,{sender:'user',message:messageToSend}]);try{const response=await axiosInstance.post('/api/chat/',{message:messageToSend});console.log('Response from API:',response.data);setChatHistory(prevHistory=>[...prevHistory,{sender:'ai',message:response.data.response}]);setMessage('');fetchChatHistory();}catch(error){console.error('Error generating response:',error);setChatHistory(prevHistory=>[...prevHistory,{sender:'ai',message:'Error generating response.
